var ids = [20,21,22,23,63,103,102,82,100,140,141,181,180,179,199,239,219,220,221,201,182,142,158,144,104,78,36,246,4,3,43,83,123,124,125,186,166,165,185,163,162,161,121,122,101,81,80,79,77,7,37,38,39,243,28,13,67,106,146,126,187,188,189,229,228,227,226,225,224,223,183,184,164,145,105,58,26,25,245,5,6,115,114,154,128,168,174,209,210,211,212,213,214,234,173,172,171,170,153,133,89,70,30,10,244,34,47,73,113,169,193,194,195,235,208,233,232,230,231,191,190,192,152,130,110,109,108,68,69,50,12,32,241,17,57,56,55,54,53,93,94,95,96,117,98,59,60,61,62,65,107,147,148,149,150,151,112,72,71,49,8,247,51,52,92,91,90,111,131,132,129,134,135,136,176,175,207,167,127,87,86,85,84,44,45,46,33,29,9,249,11,31,27,14,15,16,248,35,74,48,88,155,156,177,197,196,236,206,238,218,178,198,143,159,119,118,97,116,66,75,76,24,242,18,19,64,99,139,138,137,157,217,216,215,237,205,204,203,202,222,240,200,160,120,41,42,2,1,40];

var lista=[];
var array=[];
for (var i=0;i<ids.length;i++){
   if (ids[i]>240){
   		lista.push(array);
      array=[];
   } else {
      array.push(ids[i])
   }
}
if(array.length>0)lista.push(array);



document.getElementById('hola').value = JSON.stringify(lista);
